wiki.content: The It Will Rain Songfacts reports that Twilight music producer Alexandra Patsavas chose Mars to record a song for the movie as the film centered on a wedding and, "Who more appropriate than Bruno Mars to write a timeless, classic wedding song?" User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The It Will Rain Songfacts reports that Twilight music producer Alexandra Patsavas chose Mars to record a song for the movie as the film centered on a wedding and, "Who more appropriate than Bruno Mars to write a timeless, classic wedding song?"

track.name: It Will Rain
comments: beautiful song, the only one of his i can really tolerate. [4] But If I Was Your Man is quite good as well.
beautiful song, the only one of his i can really tolerate. [3]
